attributes.action: More help and Support for victims of domestic abuse
attributes.additional_details: Hundreds and thousands of domestic abuse victims need to be heard and supported
attributes.background: To change the law for Victims of domestic abuse

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We understand you want more support for victims of domestic abuse, but we're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do. 

You may wish to sign and share some of these petitions:
Increase minimum and maximum sentences for domestic violence offences
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/332102

Fund more advertising for helplines for children and domestic violence victims:
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/314054

Fund increased social services support & emergency accommodation during Covid19:
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/309559

Abolish time limits to bring charges for offences for acts of domestic violence:
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/555276

Provide free, unconditional, legal aid for victims of domestic abuse:
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/319178
                
You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
